body:
- Fixed sprites for boulders, conduits and some other miscellaneous blocks
- Fixed spirit drone factory appearing twice in tech tree
- Fixed some issues with drone AI
- Improved icons
- Made buildings destroyed during construction get automatically canceled
- Improved salvo range and reload
- Improved repair point effectiveness
- Added circle around enemy spawnpoints
- Added additional options to scatter filter
- Added "default ores" shortcut button in editor filters
- Added blend filter for implementing block transitions
- Added two new custom game maps
- Added logo to replace startup black screen [Not functional on all devices, temporary]
- Added button to move server to top on list
name: v4 Build 81 - Beta
